protein.specific_function: Production of cholesterol by reduction of C7-C8 double bond of 7-dehydrocholesterol (7-DHC).

reference.reference_text: Waterham HR, Wijburg FA, Hennekam RC, Vreken P, Poll-The BT, Dorland L, Duran M, Jira PE, Smeitink JA, Wevers RA, Wanders RJ: Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome is caused by mutations in the 7-dehydrocholesterol reductase gene. Am J Hum Genet. 1998 Aug;63(2):329-38.
